mapper.select: select no, optional_course.studentNo, student.studentName, optional_course.courseNo, course.courseName, grade from optional_course, student, course where optional_course.studentNo = student.studentNo and optional_course.courseNo = course.courseNo
mapper.insert:
select if(max(no) is null, 100001, max(no) + 1) as newId from optional_course
insert into optional_course (no,studentNo,courseNo,grade) value(#{no},#{studentNo},#{courseNo},#{grade})
